Accessibility

div.p: Checotah Public Schools does notÂ discriminateÂ based on race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs or activities. Career and technical education is offered to all students at the high school in Agricultural Education, Business and Information Technology, and Family and Consumer Science. Students in 11th and 12th grade may participate tuition-free in technical training programs at Indian Capital Technology Center. Inquiries concerning this policy may be directed to the Superintendent, 320 West Jefferson Avenue, Checotah, Oklahoma 74426. Phone: 918-473-5610
